title: White Medium Square

adjectives: (of a surface) not written or printed on
Forming a right angle, especially at right angles with the mast or the keel, and parallel to the horizon; said of the yards of a square-rigged vessel when they are so braced.
Having four equal sides and four right angles or forming a right angle

description: A medium-sized square shaded completely white. Smaller than the White Large Square and larger than the White Medium-Small Square and the White Small Square.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the white medium square emoji presents a clean, crisp geometric shape with a subtle, almost matte finish.  Its perfectly aligned sides and soft, rounded corners evoke a sense of order and clarity, a hallmark of Apple's minimalist aesthetic.  This versatile symbol, with its understated elegance on Apple devices, can be used to represent spaces, boundaries, or simply as a neutral visual element in digital compositions.
